creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
description: thirteen graduated beaded loops in blue and white with red ends attached to strips of hide; black, red and gold beaded pendants on outer edge of hide strips; ring with painted thimble and yarn pompon at center bottom; round shell accents at top of hide strips
medium: Animal hide, beads, shell, metal, cotton (?)
title: Loop Necklace
